items.title: Enhance CJK Font Support for WeChat in Wisdom ðŸŽ¨
items.summary: This update resolves the issue of blank text rendering in WeChat when running under Wine by adding CJK font aliases. The Dockerfile now includes a command to run `winetricks fakechinese`, ensuring that Windows Chinese font names are properly mapped to the installed Linux fonts. Additionally, a migration script in the entrypoint.sh file ensures existing pods are updated with the new font configuration.

items.title: Launch OpenClaw Service Introduction Page in Backend ðŸš€
items.summary: We've added a detailed introduction page for the OpenClaw deployment service, enhancing user engagement and understanding. Key updates include a new documentation file and database enhancements for translations and service descriptions. This page features various sections, including product overviews, use cases, and pricing details, all designed to comply with our platform's design specifications.
